name: BoundedUIX (RML)
description: Fork of Banane9's BoundedUIX mod before it was converted to a MonkeyLoader mod.

1.1.2.changelog:
Added:
- A mod section header in RectTransform inspectors.

Updated:
- Changed the mod ID from Banane9.BoundedUIX to je.dj.BoundedUIX for the RML mod manifest.

Built against Resonite version 2025.3.28.1172.

1.1.1.changelog:
Version bump, no functional changes.

Built against Resonite version 2024.7.12.12.

1.1.0.changelog:
Added:
- Merged FixUIXButton directly into this mod, even though it probably isn't needed.
- An option to disable the prioritization of Button components when selecting UIX elements.

Updated:
- Target .NET framework from 4.6.2 to 4.7.2
- Automatic assembly publicization using BepInEx.AssemblyPublicizer

Fixed:
- DevTip UIX selection gizmo with after Resonite's 2024.5.29.27 update.

Built against Resonite version 2024.6.11.74.
